existing_features.title: Update the UI scale control so the slider range is 10% minimum to 200% maximum (instead of 70%–130%), and ensure any slider-driven changes are clamped to 10–200.
Update the UI scale preset buttons to align with the new 10%–200% range (add/adjust presets so they cover small, normal, and large values within 10–200).
Harden preference loading/updating so a previously stored uiScale outside the 10%–200% range is automatically clamped into the valid range on load and when saving updates.

new_feature_requests.summary: Expand UI size/scale setting range to 10%–200% (instead of 70%–130%)
